item.title: Monitoring 200K DNS Queries per second using ClickHouse
item.author: Author
item.description: Why Monitor DNS traffic As a member of a Security Incident Response Team, Iâ€™ve seen that the normal security practices like deploying firewalls, IDS sensors, NSM Toolkit and Netflow Monitoring. SIRT is increasingly looking to the network as a data source. For years infosec has been network-address-centric and the attackers have adapted. Today it is very common to see malware command and control (C&C) use domain generation algorithms (DGAs), Peer-to-Peer (P2P), or even fast-flux DNS to evade IP address-based detection and blocking.
